metadata.Title: CVE-2018-1287 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: In Apache JMeter 2.X and 3.X, when using Distributed Test only (RMI based), jmeter server binds RMI Registry to wildcard host. This could allow an attacker to get Access to JMeterEngine and send unauthorized code.

criterions.comment: jakarta-jmeter: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
